bill.title: Senate Substitute for HB 2118 by Committee on Assessment and Taxation - Concerning property taxation; establishing notice and public hearing requirements prior to approval by a governing body to exceed its revenue neutral rate; providing a waiver of interest and fees on certain delinquent property taxes for a period of time and delaying preparation of delinquent real estate tax list and notice; prohibiting valuation increase for real property solely as the result of normal repair, replacement or maintenance of existing structure.
bill.description: Senate Substitute for HB 2118 by Committee on Assessment and Taxation - Concerning property taxation; establishing notice and public hearing requirements prior to approval by a governing body to exceed its revenue neutral rate; providing a waiver of interest and fees on certain delinquent property taxes for a period of time and delaying preparation of delinquent real estate tax list and notice; prohibiting valuation increase for real property solely as the result of normal repair, replacement or maintenance of existing structure.

history.action: House Introduced
House Referred to Committee on Commerce, Labor and Economic Development
House Hearing: Tuesday, February 5, 2019, 1:30 PM Room 112-N - CANCELED
House Hearing: Wednesday, February 13, 2019, 1:30 PM Room 218-N
House Committee Report recommending bill be passed as amended by Committee on Commerce, Labor and Economic Development
House Withdrawn from Calendar; Referred to Committee on Appropriations
House Withdrawn from  Committee on Appropriations; Rereferred to Committee on Commerce, Labor and Economic Development
House Committee Report recommending bill be passed as amended by Committee on Commerce, Labor and Economic Development
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Hodge
House  Representative Carpenter, B. raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled germane.
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Hodge was rejected  Yea: 45 Nay: 71
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to rerefer to committee failed
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Probst
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Probst was adopted
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Alcala
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Alcala was rejected  Yea: 32 Nay: 86
House Committee of the Whole - Be passed as amended
House Engrossed on Tuesday, March 26, 2019
House Final Action - Passed as amended;  Yea: 106 Nay: 18
Senate Received and Introduced
Senate Referred to Committee on Assessment and Taxation
Senate Hearing: Tuesday, March 10, 2020, 9:30 AM Room 152-S
Senate Committee Report recommending substitute bill be passed by Committee on Assessment and Taxation
Senate Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
Senate Committee of the Whole - Committee Report be adopted recommending substitute bill be passed
Senate Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Senator Tyson
Senate Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Senator Tyson was adopted
Senate Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Senator Holland
Senate Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Senator Holland was adopted  Yea: 28 Nay: 9
Senate Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Senator Olson
Senate Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Senator Olson was rejected  Yea: 9 Nay: 30
Senate Emergency Final Action - Substitute passed as amended;  Yea: 35 Nay: 2
House Died on Calendar

votes.desc: House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Hodge was rejected - Yea: 45 Nay: 71
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Alcala was rejected - Yea: 32 Nay: 86
House Final Action - Passed as amended - Yea: 106 Nay: 18
Senate Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Senator Holland was adopted - Yea: 26 Nay: 11
Senate Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Senator Olson was rejected - Yea: 9 Nay: 30
Senate Emergency Final Action - Substitute passed as amended - Yea: 35 Nay: 2
